name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of May 18, Jiang Shuiping, a citizen of Leiyang, Hunan, was taken away by six or seven Leiyang police officers in the lobby of a hotel in Yongzhou for publicly expressing his disapproval of Putin's visit to China. Luo Qun, a citizen of Hengyang who was with Jiang Shuiping, was also taken away by Hengyang police at the same time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger said that he just wanted more people to see the living conditions of left-behind children, but after the video went viral, the municipal government issued instructions, and the mayor and secretary personally found him, and pressure was exerted from multiple parties, and he was eventually forced to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, an ambulance in Dalian was hit by a car while passing a red light, causing many people in the ambulance to be thrown out of the car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a scene in the new MV of the Korean girl group IVE was said to be similar to a relief sculpture in the "mass grave" memorial hall in Datong, Shanxi. This caused dissatisfaction among many netizens inside the Great Firewall, who believed that the group was once again suspected of insulting China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 20, China's Ministry of Commerce issued an announcement, deciding to include Boeing Defense, Space & Security Group of the United States, which is involved in arms sales to Taiwan, in the unreliable entity list and take the following measures:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 19, on the Hunan Xiangtan section of the Shanghai-Kunming Expressway, a car owner was forced to stop by an Audi. A man then got out of the Audi and smashed the glass with a stick and threatened the car owner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 19, Hebei. Because ginger merchants bought ginger from local ginger farmers and ran away without paying, ginger farmers put up banners in the trading market to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, in Hebei, the owners of Hanlin Blue Mountain were dissatisfied with the overdue delivery of the house and the forced binding of the basement. On that day, they held a banner and marched in the street to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 20, Cangzhou, Hebei. The Country Garden Star Diamond project was left unfinished, and the owners shouted in front of the county government, "See the county magistrate!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that a local article calling for blood donations for the children who were hacked had been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos of June 4th. Scenes of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 8 (May 20)
[2 million people blocked military vehicles to protest martial law] [Martial law order turned into a dead letter]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Domestic netizens "mourn" Peking University honorary professor
